3 Mapa de calor Gr√°fico exemplo - Mapa de calor library(tidyverse) library(highcharter) dados_plot %>% hchart( type = 'heatmap', hcaes( x = ano, y = tipo, value = pct ), name = "Teste" ) %>% hc_plotOptions( series = list( dataLabels = list( enabled = TRUE, format = '{point.value:.2f}%' ) ) ) %>% hc_colorAxis( maxColor = '#222c6a', minColor = '#009761' ) %>% hc_tooltip( pointFormat = paste('{point.tipo}: <b>{point.pct:.,2f}%</b><br>') ) %>% hc_yAxis(title = list(text = 'Tipo')) %>% hc_xAxis(title = list(text = 'Ano')) %>% hc_legend(enabled = FALSE) ano tipo pct 2017 A 83.46 2017 B 9.06 2017 C 0.06 2017 D 1.59 2017 E 5.91 2018 A 80.05 2018 B 6.85 2018 C 1.59 2018 D 0.03 2018 E 11.48 2019 A 63.60 2019 B 28.00 2019 C 0.14 2019 D 0.05 2019 E 8.01
